medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain predominantly in the right upper quadrant (RUQ) that began over the prior 48 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced abdominal pain that reached a crescendo this morning, described as a burning sensation similar to prior episodes of biliary pain, accompanied by nausea and bilious emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: DMII, GERD, history of alcoholic/gallstone pancreatitis complicated by ARDS, ARF, and cholangitis requiring ERCP with sphincterotomy and biliary stent.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of gallbladder removal in mother, sister, uncle, and first cousin. No history of colon cancer.
